level.text: An inaugural committee shall terminate no later than forty-five (45) days from the beginning of the term of the new Mayor, except that the inaugural committee may continue to accept contributions necessary to retire the debts of the committee.
When terminating, inaugural committees shall adhere to the applicable provisions of ยง 3016 of Chapter 30 of this title.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 60 DCR 1402 (February 8, 2013); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 60 DCR 11864 (August 16, 2013).
